speaker: murderer
dialog: We shall, my lord, perform what you command us.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Your spirits shine through you. Within this hour at most I will advise you where to plant yourselves;

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Acquaint you with the perfect spy o' the time, The moment on't; for't must be done to-night, And something from the palace;

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Always thought that I require a clearness: and with him -- To leave no rubs nor botches in the work--

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Fleance his son, that keeps him company, whose absence is no less material to me than is his father's, must embrace the fate of that dark hour.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: Resolve yourselves apart: I'll come to you anon.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: I'll call upon you straight: abide within.

speaker: macbeth
dialog: It is concluded. Banquo, thy soul's flight, if it find heaven, must find it out to-night.
